summary: Snake game application where the snake grows dynamically as users register. Features real-time visualization of the snake moving on a dynamic field, evolving as new users join the platform.
architectural_notes: Snake grows in real-time as users register

existing_features.title: Create a user registration system that allows users to sign up with a username
Create a dynamic 2D canvas visualization where the snake continuously moves across the screen in an animated pattern
Implement real-time visual updates that show the snake growing longer as new users register, with smooth segment addition animations
Design a cohesive visual theme with vibrant, playful colors and smooth animations that emphasize the dynamic, growing nature of the snake visualization

new_feature_requests.summary: Dynamic snake growth based on user signups
Real-time snake movement visualization on dynamic field
Implement backend logic to track the snake's segments, where each new user registration adds one segment to the snake
